songs.title: Come On Over (All I Want Is You)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Come on over, come on over baby
Come on over, come on over baby
Come on over, come on over baby
Come on over, come on over baby

[Verse 1]
Hey, boy, don't you know
I got something going on (yes, I do)
All my friends are gonna come, gonna party all night long
I know, you know, I just want us to go
The fun we'll have, you'll never be alone
So boy, won't you come?
We will party till the dawn
Listen to me...

[Chorus]
All I want is you (come over here, baby)
All I want is you (you make me go crazy)
All I want is you
Now baby, don't be shy, you better cross the line
I'm gonna love you right
All I want is you

[Post-Chorus]
Come on over, come on over baby
Come on over, come on over baby

[Verse 2]
I want you to know, you could be the one for me (yes, you could)
You've got all I'm looking for
You've got personality
I know (I know), you know (you know), I'm gonna give you more
But boy, you know, I never felt this way before
So boy, won't you come?
Won't you come and open the door?
Listen to me...

[Chorus]
All I want is you (come over here, baby)
All I want is you (ooh, you make me go crazy)
All I want is you
Now baby, don't be shy, you better cross the line
I'm gonna love you right
All I want is you

[Post-Chorus]
Come on over, come on over baby
Come on over, come on over baby
Come on over, come on over baby
Come on over, come on over baby
Come on over

[Chorus Variation]
Now baby, don't be shy
You better cross the line
I'm gonna love you right
I-I-I, oh, yeah

[Chorus]
All I want is you (baby)
All I want is you (oh, you make me go crazy)
All I want is you
Now baby, don't be shy, you better cross the line
I'm gonna love you right
'Cause all I want is you
All I want is you (oh, yeah)
All I want is you (you make me go crazy)
All I want is you
Now baby, don't be shy, you better cross the line
I'm gonna love you right
'Cause all I want is you
